name: daet
description: Minimal immutable date class that supports relative time, calendar time, and plus/minus of different units.
author: 2019+ Benjamin Lupton <b@lupton.cc>

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ESNext for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES2019 for web browsers with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:edition-browsers && npm run our:compile:edition-esnext && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-browsers: tsc --module ESNext --target ES2019 --outDir ./edition-browsers --project tsconfig.json && test -d edition-browsers/source && ( mv edition-browsers/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-browsers && mv edition-temp edition-browsers ) || true
scripts.our:compile:edition-esnext: tsc --module commonjs --target ESNext --outDir ./edition-esnext --project tsconfig.json && test -d edition-esnext/source && ( mv edition-esnext/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-esnext && mv edition-temp edition-esnext ) || true
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:module && npm run our:verify:prettier
